document.full_text: the international monetary fund has postponed talks in pakistan next week due to security concerns, an imf spokesman said on wednesday, delaying a deal to disburse more than $3 billion in funds to the country.
document.title: imf postpones pakistan talks, delays disbursement deal
lines_and_colors: the international monetary fund has postponed talks in pakistan next week due to security concerns, an imf spokesman said on wednesday, delaying a deal to disburse more than $3 billion in funds to the country.
